U

understandGameCommand(ClientHandler, String) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.controller.Controller
This method is called every time a client asks for a game action
understandMessage(String) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.communication.client.MessageHandler
first method to separate the message from the server using the state of the game
understandMessage(String, ClientHandler) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.controller.Controller
This method is called every time the controller receives a message
understandSettingMessages(String, ClientHandler) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.controller.Controller
This method is used by the first client that log in to set the rules of the game
updateBackground(Match) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.controller.Controller
This method send to all the clients all the information of the match
useEffect(TargetParameter, ArrayList<ArrayList<Player>>) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.cards.PowerUp
method to apply the effect of the power up if there is all target needed
usePowerUp(PowerUp, TargetParameter) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.Player
This method is the power up use action
usePowerUp(GridPane, StackPane) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.ButtonsGUI
This method draws what is inside the use power up button
